verses.verse: In the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H3318>gone<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

For they were <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H7508>Rephidim,<s%> and were <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4057>desert<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and had <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>camped<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to him out of the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and how I <S%H5375>bore<s%> you <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H5404>eagles'<s%> <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> you to myself.

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> indeed, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> then you shall be a <S%H5459>peculiar<s%> treasure to me above <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> is mine:

And you shall be to me a <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> before their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> we will <S%H6213>do.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2009>See,<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> to you in a <S%H5645>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8085>hear<s%> when I <S%H1696>speak<s%> with you, and <S%H539>believe<s%> you for <S%H5769>ever.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them to <S%H3117>day<s%> and to <S%H4279>morrow,<s%> and let them <S%H3526>wash<s%> their <S%H8071>clothes,<s%>

And be <S%H3559>ready<s%> against the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> for the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> on <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

And you shall set <S%H1379>bounds<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourselves, that you <S%H5927>go<s%> not up into the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> or <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H7097>border<s%> of it: <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> shall be surely put to <S%H4191>death:<s%>

There shall not an <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> it, but he shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> be <S%H5619>stoned,<s%> or <S%H3384>shot<s%> through; <S%H518>whether<s%> it be <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> it shall not <S%H2421>live:<s%> when the <S%H3104>trumpet<s%> sounds <S%H4900>long,<s%> they shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up to the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and they <S%H3526>washed<s%> their <S%H8071>clothes.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> Be <S%H3559>ready<s%> against the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H5066>come<s%> not <S%H413>at<s%> your <S%H802>wives.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that there were <S%H6963>thunders<s%> and <S%H1300>lightning,<s%> and a <S%H3515>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%> on the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H2389>loud;<s%> so that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that was in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H2729>trembled.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> with <S%H430>God;<s%> and they <S%H3320>stood<s%> at the <S%H8482>nether<s%> part of the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> was <S%H3605>altogether<s%> on a <S%H6225>smoke,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> on it in <S%H784>fire:<s%> and the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> thereof <S%H5927>ascended<s%> as the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of a <S%H3536>furnace,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2729>quaked<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>

And <S%H1961>when<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H1980>sounded<s%> long, and waxed <S%H3966>louder<s%> and <S%H3966>louder,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him by a <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> on <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> up to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3381>Go<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H5749>charge<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> they <S%H2040>break<s%> through to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H7200>gaze,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> of them <S%H5307>perish.<s%>

And let the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> which <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> themselves, <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6555>break<s%> forth on them.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> up to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai:<s%> for you <S%H5749>charged<s%> us, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Set <S%H1379>bounds<s%> <S%H854>about<s%> the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3212>Away,<s%> <S%H3381>get<s%> you <S%H3381>down,<s%> and you shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up, you, and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> with you: but let not the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2040>break<s%> through to <S%H5927>come<s%> up to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H6555>break<s%> forth on them.
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to them.
